Round_Rock.Ushicon: Ushicon is an annual three day anime convention held during February at the Wingate by Wyndham Round Rock Hotel & Conference Center in Round Rock, Texas. The convention resumed operation in 2011 as an 18-and-older event. It was originally held in Austin, Texas, from 2002 to 2006 until ceasing operations due to changes in anime fandom and facility issues.
